about_the_game:
In Ball Quizzle you control a ball through challenging levels and solve challenging puzzles. The goal in each level is to collect 100 coins to advance to the next level.

Jump over obstacles, pay attention to the right timing and use the mechanics in the levels to find and collect all the coins. But be careful because any wrong move can cause the level to restart and you will lose all the coins you have collected so far in the level. So be careful and if I could give you a little tip along the way: the color red means danger! You didn't expect that ;-)

The game uses the password principle from the 1990s: When you enter a new level, you get the password for that level either directly visible or hidden.

Ball Quizzle will launch in Early Access and a new level will be added with each update. More than 15 levels are planned for the final version.

short_description: BallQuizzle is a 3D Jump & Run Puzzle Game in which you control the ball through obstacles and solve puzzles. Goal of each Level is to find and collect 100 coins. You found Coin Number 100? Great then jump inside the green pipe to get to the next Level.
